mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NM, USER_TYPE, CLNT_CD, CUST_CTR_CD, CUST_CD, POSITION, TEL, EMAIL FROM USER_MANAGE WHERE USER_ID=#{userId}
SELECT USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NM, USER_TYPE, CLNT_CD, CUST_CTR_CD, CUST_CD, POSITION, TEL, EMAIL FROM USER_MANAGE WHERE EMAIL=#{email}
SELECT U.*, CL.CLNT_NM, CS.CUST_NM FROM USER_MANAGE U LEFT OUTER JOIN CLNT CL ON CL.CLNT_CD = U.CLNT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN CUST CS ON CS.CUST_CD = U.CUST_CD
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_MANAGE(USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NM, USER_TYPE, CLNT_CD, CUST_CTR_CD, CUST_CD, POSITION, TEL, EMAIL) VALUES (#{userId},#{userPw},#{userNm}, #{userType}, #{userType}, #{clntCd}, #{custCtrCd}, #{custCd}, #{position}, #{tel}, #{email})
